meanings.definition: A medical doctor who specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of disorders of the digestive system.
meanings.sent1: The gastroenterologists at the hospital helped many patients with stomach problems.
meanings.sent2: My uncle is a gastroenterologist who works at a clinic downtown.
meanings.sent3: The gastroenterologists had a party to celebrate a successful surgery.
meanings.sent4: She was like a gastroenterologist of emotions, sorting through feelings with precision.
meanings.sent5: The gastroenterologists were like detectives, investigating the mysteries of the digestive system.

meanings.definition: The branch of medicine that deals with the study and treatment of diseases of the digestive system.
meanings.sent1: Learning about gastroenterology in medical school fascinated me.
meanings.sent2: The hospital has a specialized department for gastroenterology.
meanings.sent3: The gastroenterology conference was informative and engaging.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for gastroenterology was evident in every conversation.
meanings.sent5: The world of gastroenterology is constantly evolving with new research.
